dcterms:description: The Room-to-Room (R2R) dataset is a benchmark for Vision-and-Language Navigation, where agents navigate in indoor environments based on human instructions.
dcterms:title: Room-to-Room (R2R) dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Chen
A. Suhr
D. K. Misra
N. Snavely
Y. Artzi
dcterms:description: The Touchdown dataset is a large-scale outdoor VLN dataset that focuses on natural language navigation and spatial reasoning in visual street environments.
dcterms:title: Touchdown dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Thomason
M. Murray
M. Cakmak
L. Zettlemoyer
dcterms:description: The CVDN dataset emphasizes robot-human dialogues during navigation, providing a framework for vision-and-dialog navigation tasks.
dcterms:title: CVDN dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Ku
P. Anderson
R. Patel
E. Ie
J. Baldridge
dcterms:description: The Room Across Room (RxR) dataset is a multilingual vision-and-language navigation dataset with dense spatiotemporal grounding.
dcterms:title: Room Across Room (RxR) dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Hong
C. Rodriguez-Opazo
Q. Wu
S. Gould
dcterms:description: The FGR2R dataset focuses on sub-instruction aware vision-and-language navigation, enhancing the navigation task by breaking down instructions.
dcterms:title: FGR2R dataset

dcterms:description: The CLR2R dataset is derived from the R2R dataset and is designed for curriculum learning in vision-and-language navigation tasks.
dcterms:title: CLR2R dataset (Room-to-Room for Curriculum Learning)
